object.script:
/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2008 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2008 R2 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2012 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser') CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2014 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2016 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2017 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2019 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2022 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Source Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Target Database Engine Edition : Microsoft Azure SQL Database Edition Target Database Engine Type : Microsoft Azure SQL Database */
CREATE USER [SmoBaselineVerification_CertUser] FOR CERTIFICATE [SmoBaselineVerification_Certificate]
